title: Kuo-Toa Archpriest
contents: subtitle | Medium humanoid (kuo-toa), neutral evil
rule
property | Armor class | 13 (natural armor)
property | Hit points | 97 (13d8 + 39)
property | Speed | 30 ft., swim 30 ft.
rule
rule
property | Skills | Perception +9, Religion +6
property | Senses | darkvision 120 ft., passive Perception 19
property | Languages | Undercommon
property | Challenge | 6 (2300)
rule
description | Amphibious. | The kuo-toa can breathe air and water.

description | Otherworldly Perception. | The kuo-toa can sense the presence of any creature within 30 feet of it that is invisible or on the Ethereal Plane. It can pinpoint such a creature that is moving.
description | Sunlight Sensitivity. | While in sunlight, the kuo-toa has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.
fill | 2
description | Slippery. | The kuo-toa has advantage on ability checks and saving throws made to escape a grapple.

description | Spellcasting. | The kuo-toa is a 10th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 14, +6 to hit with spell attacks). The kuo-toa has the following cleric spells prepared:
description | Cantrips (at will). | guidance, sacred flame, thaumaturgy
description | lst level (4 slots). | detect magic, sanctuary, shield of faith
description | 2nd level (3 slots). | hold person, spiritual weapon
description | 3rd level (3 slots). | spirit guardians, tongues
description | 4th level (3 slots). | control water, divination
description | 5th level (2 slots). | mass cure wounds, scrying
section | Actions
description | Multiattack. | The kuo-toa makes two melee attacks.
description | Scepter. | Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (ld6 + 3) bludgeoning damage plus 14 (4d6) lightning damage.
description | Unarmed Strike. | Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) bludgeoning damage.
